chapter.title: Known problems

listitem.para: Only compatible with Extbase 1.3 (shipped with TYPO3 4.5 LTS).

note.para: There is a version for TYPO3 4.4 and Extbase 1.2 in the github repository on the extbase-1.2 branch. But this branch is deprecated. There might be some bugfixes to that branch, but don't expect them or any new features.

listitem.para: Updating problems due to the development in progress of extbase might occur.

As extbase is still under heavy development and this extension uses some methods that are not marked as public API, there might be problems when updating your Extbase installation. We hope to fix them as soon as possible, but you should be aware of that issue.

chapter.para: Any known bugs can be found in the official bugtracker for cz_simple_cal.
